articles.title: Egypt's central bank received no request from Bank Audi to sell Egyptian unit
articles.description: Egypt's central bank said in statement on Monday it had not received a request from Lebanon's Bank Audi to sell its Egyptian unit.
articles.content:
CAIRO, Jan 13 (Reuters) - Egypt’s central bank said in statement on Monday it had not received a request from Lebanon’s Bank Audi to sell its Egyptian unit.
